licence_key.label: Licence Key
licence_key.comment: Write your licence key. The key is inside New Order e-mail.

requesttype.label: Ajax request type
requesttype.comment: Recommended GET. Also leave GET if you don't know what is that.

load_jquery.label: Load jQuery?
load_jquery.comment: Leave 'Yes' if you don't know what is that. ONLY if your site already loads jquery you can disable popup jquery so it won't be loaded again and thus you save 90kb of loading.

asynchronous.label: Make JavaScript Asynchronous?
asynchronous.comment: By default JavaScript blocks page DOM until the script is loaded. To prevent popup JavaScript from blocking the parser we recommend choosing 'Yes'. If you don't want to show page content before popup is loaded, choose 'No'.

ajax_async.label: Ajax async settings on window exit
ajax_async.comment: User can leave browser window when popup is still opened without any interaction. This event is tracked in statistics as 'Window closed or page left'. Ajax call is created for this purpose. When 'asynchronously' is selected the browser window will be closed without delay, but some browsers may cancel ajax call and statistics will be less accurance. Selecting 'synchronous' statistics will be more accurance, but this will lock browser window when closing it until ajax call is finished. Usually it is not detectable by user and it takes less than half second, but it can be more if server is slow.

ga_tracking.label: Event tracking with Google analytics?
ga_tracking.comment: You must have Google Analytics javascript code already installed on your website for this to work.

enablemagento.label: Add subscriber's e-mail to Magento Newsletter
enablemagento.comment: Subscriber's e-mail is added to Magento by default. If you use any external newsletter service from the below list, you can disable this option.

enablemailchimp.label: Add subscriber's e-mail to Mailchimp
enablemailchimp.comment: Choose yes if you want to use Mailchimp integration.

mailchimp_key.label: Mailchimp Api Key
mailchimp_key.comment: Write only if you use MailChimp service, otherwise leave empty. Go to http://admin.mailchimp.com/account/api/ to find the key. Make sure you also submited Mailchimp list id inside newsletter widget in popup editor.

mailchimp_double_option.label: Mailchimp Double Opt-in
mailchimp_double_option.comment: If yes, user needs to confirm subscription. Read more about MailChimp The Double Opt-in Process here.

activecampaign_key.comment: Write only if you use ActiveCampaign service, otherwise leave empty. You can find key here.

Create your own APP here or leave the secret and key setted to magebird AWeber App.

After saving secret and key go to this link where you connect magebird or your new App to your AWeber account - depending on the saved details. In case of your own app, you should check premission settings -> Request Subsriber Data should be checked, if not the magebird extension can't check if email is already subsribed.
